name: Dwarfs stick together
description:
Move - WSAD
Attack - space
Map - tab

You're Dopey, one of the seven dwarfs. You lost the six other dwarfs and you are trying to find them. Fight your way through Mines filled with evil mushrooms. Explore all 35 totally different rooms with the 7 dwarfs. Every one of the as a special ability. 
Have fun!!!

Unfortunately there was just no time for sfx :((
